posts.message:
[align=center][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jpbRhrRig2LgV.png[/IMG][/align]

The edition you are currently reading is the [color=#FF1493][b]1st notice edition[/b][/color]. To read any older editions of HF News, please go [url=http://goo.gl/pxojJ]here[/url]. 

[align=center][img]http://i.minus.com/jba1spITkcOXLN.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]HF News[/color][/b]
The HF News is now going to be released on Fridays.
We hope this time works best for everyone, and that you enjoy what comes of it.

That is all.
posts.subject: [4/25/12] - HF News (Notice)
